About.about-sec1-desc1: Since 2020, I have found my interest in UI/UX design and after self-taught learning, I started to gain experience in this field.
About.about-sec1-desc2: After that, I felt that I was interested in development topics and started learning JavaScript as a programming language and React JS as a framework.
About.about-sec1-desc3: Currently, I am very eager to work in the field of front-end development and improve my knowledge and experience in this field day by day.
